We have a situation in which we need to create a custimozed version of WPF data grid to support pagination. and this needs to be shared across the application. 

So we are looking for creating a new custom WPF data grid which supports pagination.

you can find a nice solution at http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WpfDataVirtualization.aspx or at bea.stollnitz.com/blog/?p=344.

those solutions still need some modification but it's very elegant and has a decent documentation.

share with us your thoughts.
